Class DirectedGraphArc<V,A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • DirectedGraphArc<V,A>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of data associated with nodes in the graph
    A - the type of data associated with arcs in the graph

    public class DirectedGraphArc<V,A>
extends Object
    Class that models arcs in the directed arcs. Stores both the end-points, as well as the data associated with the arc.
    Author:
    Paul Bouman
